UnitDefinition.Name: Dietary intake calculation tier types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Dietary intake calculation tier types.

Unit.Name: Custom
Unit.Description: By setting this tier to custom, the exposure model can be configured in any way desirable (without tier specific presets).

Unit.Name: EFSA 2012 - Dietary exposure assessment - Optimistic
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the optimistic scenario of the EFSA 2012 methodology for dietary exposure assessment.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2012 - Dietary exposure assessment - Pessimistic
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the pessimistic scenario of the EFSA 2012 methodology for dietary exposure assessment.

Unit.Name: EC 2018 - Dietary CRA - Tier I
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the Tier I scenario of the EC 2018 methodology for dietary CRA.

Unit.Name: EC 2018 - Dietary CRA - Tier II
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the Tier II scenario of the EC 2018 methodology for dietary CRA.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2012 - Acute dietary exposure assessment - Pessimistic
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the pessimistic scenario of the EFSA 2012 methodology for acute dietary exposure assessment.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2012 - Chronic dietary exposure assessment - Pessimistic
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the pessimistic scenario of the EFSA 2012 methodology for chronic dietary exposure assessment.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2022 - Dietary CRA - Tier I
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the Tier I scenario of the EFSA 2022 methodology for dietary CRA.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2022 - Dietary CRA - Tier II
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the Tier II scenario of the EFSA 2022 methodology for dietary CRA.
